channel.title: Comments on: The Magic Ends
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: I'm anxious to hear your thoughts on the Dark Tower as a whole. I won't say anything yet in case you haven't finished....
item.content:encoded: I’m anxious to hear your thoughts on the Dark Tower as a whole. I won’t say anything yet in case you haven’t finished….

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description:
I guess so. I just wish so many things weren't ending all at once.
And last night, Big Poppa E announced he was going on tour and never coming back to Austin.
item.content:encoded:
I guess so. I just wish so many things weren’t ending all at once.

And last night, Big Poppa E announced he was going on tour and never coming back to Austin.

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: But isn't part of the magic the fact that it ends? That's what makes it bittersweet.
item.content:encoded: But isn’t part of the magic the fact that it ends? That’s what makes it bittersweet.
